rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you don't control gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
Grand evolution 6–{5}{U} [i]({5}{U}: If this isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature, then put six +1/+1 counters on it. Activate as a sorcery.)[/i]
